title: Week 12 Picks, Thanksgiving Recap (Football 11/24)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco, Will Brinson and Jason La Canfora are back for the Week 12 Pick Six picks pod! First, Nick and Pete recap their Thanksgiving menu and the slate of football on Thursday including the Cowboys dropping their third straight (3:20), Case Keenum continuing to impress (7:25), and the Turkey Day nightcap featuring the Redskins and Giants (11:40). Next, the guys cover the rest of the Week 12 schedule, while trying to cover the spread (13:55). Will joins the crew to give his best bets (29:50), then it's JLC hopping on board for his "Satanic Voice Bet of the Week" (41:15).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
